channel.title: Sumiagaming Project [Look for more information]
channel.description:
[b]Sumiagaming[/b] is [b]project [/b]running for a while now. It is hosting [b]3 world of wacraft servers[/b], and is now [b]opening runescape servers[/b] aswell. [font=verdana] [size=small][s]We currently have a random PK server running, nothing special and its not what this project is about.[/s][/size][/font]
[font=verdana] [size=small][b][u]Project information :[/u][/b][/size][/font][font=verdana] [size=small]- We need 2 developers[/size][/font][font=verdana] [size=small]- All server payments are payed by me[/size][/font][font=verdana] [size=small]- Server will be running 24/7 stable[/size][/font][font=verdana] [size=small]- Developers ofcourse obtain Admin, but also in conversation with me able to obtain real cash trough paypal.[/size][/font]
[b][u]What are we willing to achieve :[/u][/b][font=verdana] [size=small]A stable, secured running Runescape 317 or 508 with working skilling a stable marketing and certain important quests for certain items as d scim ect and a member function to improve skilling rates in exp, and certain items/zones.[/size]
[size=small]I am not gonna spend to much time on this topic, if you feel like you are going to be usefull for this project please contact me trough e-mail Justin_ruijgrok@hotmail.com or PM me.[/size]
[size=small]Also i need some suggestions for a stable source to start with.[/size]
[size=small]Thanks, and hope to hear from you soon ![/size]
[size=small]Sumia from Sumiagaming.[/size][/font]

item.title: Sumiagaming Project [Look for more information]
item.dc:creator: @EndlessLife EndlessLife
item.description:
@EndlessLife wrote:

Sumiagaming is project running for a while now.
It is hosting 3 world of wacraft servers, and is now opening runescape servers aswell.
[font=verdana]
[size=small]We currently have a random PK server running, nothing special and its not what this project is about.[/size][/font]

[font=verdana]
[size=small]Project information :[/size][/font][font=verdana]
[size=small]- We need 2 developers[/size][/font][font=verdana]
[size=small]- All server payments are payed by me[/size][/font][font=verdana]
[size=small]- Server will be running 24/7 stable[/size][/font][font=verdana]
[size=small]- Developers ofcourse obtain Admin, but also in conversation with me able to obtain real cash trough paypal.[/size][/font]

What are we willing to achieve :[font=verdana]
[size=small]A stable, secured running Runescape 317 or 508 with working skilling a stable marketing and certain important quests for certain items as d scim ect and a member function to improve skilling rates in exp, and certain items/zones.[/size]

[size=small]I am not gonna spend to much time on this topic, if you feel like you are going to be usefull for this project please contact me trough e-mail Justin_ruijgrok@hotmail.com or PM me.[/size]

[size=small]Also i need some suggestions for a stable source to start with.[/size]

[size=small]Thanks, and hope to hear from you soon ![/size]

[size=small]Sumia from Sumiagaming.[/size][/font]
